quizzes.question: Which of the following options are accepted by the color property?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]The color Property [/h1] Another way of defining colors is using [b]hexadecimal values[/b] and [b]RGB[/b]. Hexadecimal form is a pound sign ([b]#[/b]) followed by at most, [b]6 hex values[/b] (0-F). RGB defines the individual values for [b]Red[/b], [b]Green[/b], and [b]Blue[/b]. In the example below, we use hexadecimal value to set the heading color to blue, and RGB form to make the paragraph red. [b]The HTML:[/b] [code format="html" ]

This is a heading

This is a paragraph

[/code] [b]The CSS:[/b] [code format="css" codeId="520"]h1 { color: [b]#0000FF;[/b] } p.example { color: [b]rgb(255,0,0);[/b] }[/code] [b]Result:[/b] [img id="2596" width="100%"]
